InterestRate.AddInterestRate_ICCApplicability: Select ICC applicability from the dropdown.
InterestRate.AddInterestRate_Edit_AnnualICC: Update annual ICC percentage, make sure to change the effective date accordingly.
InterestRate.AddInterestRate_PaymentTermsApplicabilit: Select payment terms applicability from the dropdown.
InterestRate.AddInterestRate_Edit_RepaymentPeriod: Update repayment period, make sure to change the effective date accordingly.
InterestRate.AddInterestRate_Edit_PaymentTermPercent: Update payment term percentage, make sure to change the effective date accordingly.
InterestRate.AddInterestRate_EffectiveDate: Select effective date from the calendar.
InterestRate.AddInterestRate_Save: Click here to save the interest rate.
